name: Yseop
tag_list: ai, artificial-intelligence, nlg, bi, business-intelligence, crm, self-care, advisory, cloud-computing, big-data, customer-care, support-portal, text-generation
overview:
Yseop is the only software suite that writes intelligent texts just like a human being, but at a rate of over a thousand pages per second.

Yseop is the first artificial intelligence software that writes non-repetitive text automatically in the form of personalized comments and recommendations. Yseop uses an inference engine to analyze structured data and expresses the results of this reasoning process in natural language.

With this technology, Yseop can automatically generate personalized and commented financial reports, product brochures, prep-to-meeting reports, emails or web pages, etc. Yseop also automates the generation of true one-to-one marketing messages, whether in the form of personalized emails, brochures or other marketing tools.

Yseop is a middleware and is able to deliver its technology as a SaaS or as an annual term license hosted on a company’s servers.

Currently, Yseop is able to generate text in English, German, French and Spanish and will increase the number of languages it supports in 2013 to include Asian languages (Simplified Chinese and Japanese) and Portuguese.

Research and development for Yseop’s technology began 22 years ago in 1990 with a team coming from the famous mathematical lab called ENS Cachan in France. Yseop first commercialized its product as a middleware in France in 2008 and opened up its American subsidiary (Yseop, Inc.) in Dallas, Texas in 2012.

milestones.description: Opened up new American headquarters in Dallas.
